mapper.insert: insert into team_tb(team_id, team_name, owner_id, members, deadline, img) values(team_seq.nextval, #{teamName}, #{ownerId}, #{members}, #{deadline}, #{img})
mapper.select: select distinct T.team_id, T.team_name, T.owner_id, T.members, T.deadline, T.img from team_tb T left outer join team_member_tb M on T.team_id = M.team_id where T.owner_id = #{memberid} or M.member_id = #{memberid} order by T.team_id asc
mapper.insert: insert into team_member_tb(id, team_id, member_id) values(team_member_seq.nextval, #{teamId}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select distinct M.memberid, M.name from member_tb M left outer join team_tb T on M.memberid = T.owner_id left outer join team_member_tb TM on M.memberid = TM.member_id where T.team_id = #{teamId} or TM.team_id = #{teamId} order by M.memberid asc
